request.description: List all course types. Uses filterByRequest: search, slug, name, is_active, per_page.
Create course type. New ID saved to `courseType`.
Create enrollment. New ID saved to `enrollment`.
Courses available for enrollment. Uses filterByRequest.
Courses by instructor id. Uses filterByRequest.

exec: if (json.data) { var d = json.data; if (d.id != null) pm.environment.set('course', String(d.id)); else if (d.slug) pm.environment.set('course', d.slug); if (d.id != null) pm.environment.set('courseId', String(d.id)); }

request.description: Create course. New ID/slug saved to `course` and `courseId`.
Check if course can be published.

query.description: true/false - units with or without lessons

request.description: List all units. Uses filterByRequest: course_id, unit_order, has_lessons, search, order_by, order_direction, per_page.
Units for a course. Uses filterByRequest.
Reorder units in course. Body: unit_orders (array of integers).
Create unit. New ID saved to `unit`.
Check if unit can be deleted.
Change unit position. Body: unit_order (integer, min 1).
Create unit under course. New ID saved to `unit`.
Lessons in a unit. Uses filterByRequest.
Reorder lessons in unit. Body: lesson_orders (array of integers).
Create lesson. New ID saved to `lesson`.
Change lesson position. Body: lesson_order (integer, min 1).
Create lesson under unit. New ID saved to `lesson`.

exec: if (json.data) { var d = json.data; if (d.id != null) pm.environment.set('course', String(d.id)); else if (d.slug) pm.environment.set('course', d.slug); if (d.id != null) pm.environment.set('courseId', String(d.id)); }

request.description: Create course. New ID/slug saved to `course` and `courseId`.
Reorder units. Body: unit_orders (array of integers).

Reorder lessons. Body: lesson_orders (array of integers).
